channel.title: [req]Banner/slogan
channel.description:
This is an easy job, no renders involved.
A bright, fag-ish sig sized picture is all I need.
Text will say: You've just been jme'd (lowercase jme, UNLESS your font is only capital letters)
The purpose of this is because I just became a mod on a large forum(32k members) infested with scammers, and Im gonna teach them all a lesson. Everytime I encounter one of these scammers, I will display this image :D Plus Im recording their IP's etc.. If they post keyloggers then call their ISP or something.
So, size = 400*100, colors should be pink with white creamy swirls. Maybe use the lens flare filter on too(but not intensely)?
Just remember, it has to look gay!(Also, NO renders allowed).
Thanks!
PS, this is just a 2 minute job. Doesnt have to look too great, also i just remembered, use a legible font, but still a little girlish.

item.title: [req]Banner/slogan
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Hrm..

I dunno. I really hate saying this and I feel like an asshole, but I just dont really like it. I think its the font and font color though, if you still have the project file, could you try chaning the font and font color? Lots of people blend th etext into the background to give it a realy cool effect, thats sorta what I was going for. As for the background, thats definitly fine. I just dont like the font.

Omg, I just got a wicked idea! Can you put FEZ's head on there somewhere?
Doesnt have to be his whole face, just enough to distinguish that it is FEZ(From that 70's show).

Here is a pic of him: http://z.about.com/d/primetimetv/1/0/v/7/that70sshow_Wilmer2002_72.jpg

So, if you or anyone else is up to it, Im still looking for a similar pic like above, with FEZ's head(http://z.about.com/d/primetimetv/1/0/v/7/that70sshow_Wilmer2002_72.jpg) and a darker, better font.

Read full topic
